name: devonboarder-docs
description: DevOnboarder documentation generation tools and scripts
author: DevOnboarder Project

scripts.docs: typedoc --tsconfig bot/tsconfig.json --entryPoints bot/src/main.ts --entryPointStrategy expand --skipErrorChecking --out docs/bot-api && typedoc --tsconfig frontend/tsconfig.json --entryPoints frontend/src/main.tsx --entryPointStrategy expand --skipErrorChecking --out docs/frontend-api
